    Description
    CholeskyDecomposition
     
    EigenDecomposition
    Eigenvalue and Eigenvector decomposition.
    EigenDecomposition.Algorithm
    Computes eigendecomposition using QR algorithm.
    LUDecomposition
    LU Decomposition: A = LU where L is lower triangular, U is upper triangular.
    MatrixSolver.Strategy
    Solver strategy/algorithm.
    QRDecomposition
    QR Decomposition: A = QR where Q is orthogonal, R is upper triangular.
    SVDDecomposition
    Singular Value Decomposition (SVD).
    SVDDecomposition.Algorithm
    Computes SVD using Golub-Reinsch algorithm.
